title: Integration Testing - WASM & Parallel Computing
description: Create and run integration tests for WASM modules and parallel computing infrastructure to verify end-to-end functionality.

tasks.description: Create WASM integration test file - Create test/unit-tests/wasm/wasm-integration.test.js with tests for WasmLoader initialization and basic WASM module loading
Add matrix multiplication WASM tests - Add tests to verify MatrixWasmBridge.multiply works correctly for 2x2, 3x3, and larger matrices
Create parallel computing test file - Create test/unit-tests/parallel/parallel-integration.test.js with tests for WorkerPool initialization and basic worker communication
Add ParallelMatrix operation tests - Test ParallelMatrix operations distribute correctly across workers and produce correct results
Run full test suite and verify no regressions - Run 'npm test' and 'npm run test:all' to verify all existing tests pass alongside new integration tests

acceptanceCriteria: WASM module loads successfully in tests
Matrix multiplication via WASM produces correct results
npm run lint passes or has acceptable warnings only
No runtime errors from type mismatches
